meanings.definition: Subjected to trauma or severe emotional shock.
meanings.sent1: The poor dog looked traumatized after the loud thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: The soldier returned from war feeling traumatized by the things he had seen.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed traumatized by the sight of a cucumber behind it.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house appeared traumatized by years of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The child's face was traumatized with fear after watching a scary movie.

meanings.sent1: She felt traumatized after the car accident.
meanings.sent2: The survivors of the natural disaster were deeply traumatized by the experience.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his traumatized phone was tired of all the notifications.
meanings.sent4: The old tree looked traumatized by the harsh winter winds.
meanings.sent5: The character in the book was traumatized by the loss of a loved one.
